short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer friendly color palette extension for Dribbble

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lot of us look out for color inspirations from Dribbble. Copying hex codes has always been difficult. ColorFlick for Dribbble introduces a developer friendly color palette to quickly copy hex codes to your clipboard. Also there is Coolors(https://coolors.co) palette link as well too save a shareable palette from you favourite Dribbble shot.
